longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Poland must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of Poland.
  

Visa required, except for Nationals of Poland.
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Poland will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Poland are expected to hold
  their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination
